name: CurieVision, Inc.
description: Developer of a 3D product generation platform designed to offer 3D shopping assistance. The company's platform allows shoppers to discover the best reviews and product news at the point of a camera, enabling customers to instantly educate and consense information and make purchases.
one_liner: Developer of a 3D product generation platform designed to offer 3D shopping assistance. The company's platform allows shoppers to discover the best reviews and product news at the point of a camera, enabling customers to instantly educate and consense information and make purchases.
industry: AI/Machine Learning, Ecommerce, Retail, VR/AR, Deep Tech, Artificial Intelligence / Machine Learning, Augmented Reality / Virtual Reality, Mobile, Commerce

name: Sira Medical, Inc.
description: Developer of augmented reality software designed to help clinicians with pre-surgical planning, training, and education. The company's software helps clinicians display imaging to patients in a way that is clear and understandable, enabling healthcare professionals to view human anatomy in a completely new way.
one_liner: Developer of augmented reality software designed to help clinicians with pre-surgical planning, training, and education. The company's software helps clinicians display imaging to patients in a way that is clear and understandable, enabling healthcare professionals to view human anatomy in a completely new way.
industry: Health Tech, Healthcare, Augmented Reality / Virtual Reality

name: Synervoz Communications Inc.
description: Developer of an innovation & software studio intended to focus on audio, entertainment, and online collaboration. The company has designed, developed, and co-created apps, SDKs, and embedded products with complex audio pipelines focused on custom engineering solutions for other companies and source code that can be licensed or purchased outright, enabling clients to have access to applications that are balanced in real-time and offers non-live content that can be synchronized between parties.
one_liner: Developer of an innovation & software studio intended to focus on audio, entertainment, and online collaboration. The company has designed, developed, and co-created apps, SDKs, and embedded products with complex audio pipelines focused on custom engineering solutions for other companies and source code that can be licensed or purchased outright, enabling clients to have access to applications that are balanced in real-time and offers non-live content that can be synchronized between parties.
industry: AI/Machine Learning, AudioTech, Developer Tools, Gaming, No Code, Telecommunications, Deep Tech, Augmented Reality / Virtual Reality, Entertainment / Media, Consumer, Network Effects

name: Verofax Limited
description: Developer of a blockchain-based intelligent application suite designed to help achieve complete inventory oversight and create immersive experiences. The company's platform is powered by smart serialization and traceability offering connected products and intelligent data analytics, enabling businesses to increase sales and reduce costs by streamlining operations, improving control over operations and automating processes.
one_liner: Developer of a blockchain-based intelligent application suite designed to help achieve complete inventory oversight and create immersive experiences. The company's platform is powered by smart serialization and traceability offering connected products and intelligent data analytics, enabling businesses to increase sales and reduce costs by streamlining operations, improving control over operations and automating processes.
industry: AI/Machine Learning, Retail, Augmented Reality / Virtual Reality

name: Virtualtech Frontier Sdn. Bhd.
description: Developer and provider of virtual event solutions created to serve as a catalyst to promote collaboration and engagement by bridging digital technologies into real-world applications. The company offers virtual solutions for any type of event including virtual exhibitions, classrooms, and conferences, live-stream events, along with some added features such as allowing visitors to take photos and edit them for social media, online payment gateway integration, enabling users to sell and carry out transactions directly from their virtual events among others.
one_liner: Developer and provider of virtual event solutions created to serve as a catalyst to promote collaboration and engagement by bridging digital technologies into real-world applications. The company offers virtual solutions for any type of event including virtual exhibitions, classrooms, and conferences, live-stream events, along with some added features such as allowing visitors to take photos and edit them for social media, online payment gateway integration, enabling users to sell and carry out transactions directly from their virtual events among others.
industry: SaaS, Web 3, Augmented Reality / Virtual Reality

name: Vision Space Inc.
description: Developer of digital twin technology that allows for fast, cost-effective 3D modeling, simulation, and real-time monitoring of factories and logistics centers using AI-powered 3D generators and editors, enhancing productivity and reducing costs through optimized industrial robot operations and remote control.
one_liner: Developer of digital twin technology that allows for fast, cost-effective 3D modeling, simulation, and real-time monitoring of factories and logistics centers using AI-powered 3D generators and editors, enhancing productivity and reducing costs through optimized industrial robot operations and remote control.

name: Zoog.A.I. Ltd.
description: Developer of a visual communication platform designed to interact in a fresh and fun way. The company's platform offers an asynchronous communication experience to bring books to life using built-in AR masks, filters, sound effects, and animations, enabling people to create meaningful family moments.

industry: Education, Augmented Reality / Virtual Reality, Consumer

name: GlamST LLC
description: Provider of an omni-channel services intended to provide an Augmented Reality platform for Beauty thru Virtual Try-on. The company's omni-channel services provides limitless sample experience and turn beauty advisors into experts, enabling women to try on makeup of any brand, from anywhere.
one_liner: Provider of an omni-channel services intended to provide an Augmented Reality platform for Beauty thru Virtual Try-on. The company's omni-channel services provides limitless sample experience and turn beauty advisors into experts, enabling women to try on makeup of any brand, from anywhere.
